TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolBar extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 表示 Windows 工具列。

span.span: Represents a Windows toolbar.

summary.span: 雖然 會取代並且將功能加入至之前版本的 控制項；不過，也可以選擇保留 ，以提供回溯相容性 (Backward Compatibility) 以及供未來使用。

span.span: Although replaces and adds functionality to the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項用來顯示控制項可以顯示為標準按鈕、 切換樣式的按鈕或下拉式清單樣式 按鈕。 controls are used to display controls that can appear as a standard button, a toggle-style button, or a drop-down style button. 您可以藉由建立映像將指派給按鈕，將它指派給工具列上，與指派的映像索引值屬性屬性每個。You can assign images to the buttons by creating an , assigning it to the property of the toolbar, and assigning the image index value to the property each . 然後，您可以指派文字，以顯示下或右邊的映像設定屬性。You can then assign text to be displayed underneath or to the right of the image by setting the property of the . 設定工具列屬性，提供工具列和其按鈕一般外觀。Set the property of the toolbar to to give the toolbar and its buttons a flat appearance. 當滑鼠指標移到按鈕，其外觀會變更為 3d。As the mouse pointer moves over the buttons, their appearance changes to three-dimensional. 工具列按鈕可以使用分隔符號來分割為邏輯群組。Toolbar buttons can be divided into logical groups by using separators. 分隔符號是工具列按鈕與屬性設定為`ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator`。A separator is a toolbar button with the property set to `ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator`. 按鈕分隔符號會顯示為線條，而不是當工具列有平面外觀的按鈕之間的空格。Button separators appear as lines rather than spaces between the buttons when the toolbar has a flat appearance. 如果屬性設定為，引發和三維的工具列按鈕會出現。If the property is set to , the toolbar buttons appear raised and three-dimensional. 如果您指定的值屬性，在工具列中的所有按鈕都都限制為指定的大小。If you specify a value for the property, all buttons in the tool bar are restricted to the specified size. 否則，按鈕調整其大小，根據其內容，而屬性會傳回最大按鈕的初始大小。Otherwise, the buttons adjust their size depending on their content, and the property returns the initial size of the largest button. 若要建立的集合控制項以顯示上，透過將按鈕加入個別使用或方法屬性。To create a collection of controls to display on the , add the buttons individually by using the or methods of the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立和三個控制項。The following code example creates a and three controls. 工具列按鈕指派給按鈕集合、 集合指派給工具列和工具列加入至表單。The toolbar buttons are assigned to the button collection, the collection is assigned to the toolbar, and the toolbar is added to the form. 在工具列的事件屬性評估時，並開啟適當的對話方塊。On the event of the toolbar, the property of the is evaluated, and the appropriate dialog box opened. 此程式碼需要、 、 ，和已建立。This code requires that a , an , a , and a have been created. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新建立的工具列控制項是空的。新增控制項，藉由設定屬性。A newly created toolbar control is empty; add controls by setting the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立和三個控制項。The following code example creates a and three controls. 工具列按鈕指派給按鈕集合、 集合指派給工具列和工具列加入至表單。The toolbar buttons are assigned to the button collection, the collection is assigned to the toolbar, and the toolbar is added to the form. 在工具列的事件屬性評估時，並開啟適當的對話方塊。On the event of the toolbar, the property of the is evaluated, and the appropriate dialog box opened. 此程式碼需要、 、 ，和已建立。This code requires that a , an , a , and a have been created. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::ToolBarAppearance Appearance { System::Windows::Forms::ToolBarAppearance get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::ToolBarAppearance value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，決定工具列控制項和其按鈕外觀。

span.span: Gets or set the value that determines the appearance of a toolbar control and its buttons.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會影響指派給工具列按鈕的外觀。The property affects the appearance of the buttons assigned to the toolbar. 當設定外觀為`ToolBarAppearance.Normal`，工具列的按鈕出現三維和引發。When the appearance is set to `ToolBarAppearance.Normal`, the toolbar's buttons appear three-dimensional and raised. 設定工具列屬性`ToolBarAppearance.Flat`，提供一般外觀的工具列按鈕。Set the property of the toolbar to `ToolBarAppearance.Flat` to give the toolbar's buttons a flat appearance. 當滑鼠指標移到一般的按鈕，它們會出現引發和三維。As the mouse pointer moves over the flat buttons, they appear raised and three-dimensional. 在分隔符號與屬性設定為會顯示為 etched 其中的線，而不是引發按鈕之間的空格。Separators on a with the property set to appear as etched lines rather than spaces between the raised buttons. 平面樣式按鈕可讓您的應用程式更類似網頁的外觀。The flat style buttons give your application a more Web-like look. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立控制項中，設定某些共用的屬性，並將它加入。The following code example creates a control, sets some of its common properties, and adds it to a . 委派也會新增至和事件。Delegates are also added to the and events. 這個範例需要名為`toolBar1`和名為`imageList1`已經宣告。This example requires that a named `toolBar1` and an named `imageList1` have been declared. [!code-cpp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CPP/mytoolbar.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CS/mytoolbar.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/VB/mytoolbar.vb#1)]

exception.span: 指派的值不是其中一個 值。

span.span: The assigned value is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool AutoSize { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property AutoSize As Boolean
public: virtual property bool AutoSize { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出工具列是否會根據按鈕大小和停駐樣式自動調整其大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the toolbar adjusts its size automatically, based on the size of the buttons and the dock style.

value.span: 如果工具列會根據按鈕大小和停駐樣式自動調整其大小，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the toolbar adjusts its size automatically, based on the size of the buttons and dock style; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設`true`、控制項調整大小，以容納工具列按鈕時，根據按鈕大小的數目它所包含的物件和工具列。When is set to `true`, the control sizes itself to accommodate the toolbar buttons, based upon the button size, the number of objects it contains, and the of the toolbar. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立控制項中，設定某些共用的屬性，並將它加入。The following code example creates a control, sets some of its common properties, and adds it to a . 委派也會新增至和事件。Delegates are also added to the and events. 這個範例需要名為`toolBar1`和名為`imageList1`已經宣告。This example requires that a named `toolBar1` and an named `imageList1` have been declared. [!code-cpp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CPP/mytoolbar.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CS/mytoolbar.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/VB/mytoolbar.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event AutoSizeChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 屬性的值已變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ToolBar1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolBar1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#564](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#564)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#564](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#564)]

span.span: Gets or sets the border style of the toolbar control.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下凹的 3d 外觀就可以接手時屬性設定為`BorderStyle.Fixed3D`。The can take on a sunken, three-dimensional appearance when the property is set to `BorderStyle.Fixed3D`. 若要顯示工具列控制項周圍單層細的框線，請設定屬性`BorderStyle.FixedSingle`。To display a flat thin border around the toolbar control, set the property to `BorderStyle.FixedSingle`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立控制項中，設定某些共用的屬性，並將它加入。The following code example creates a control, sets some of its common properties, and adds it to a . 委派也會新增至和事件。Delegates are also added to the and events. 這個範例需要名為`toolBar1`和名為`imageList1`已經宣告。This example requires that a named `toolBar1` and an named `imageList1` have been declared. [!code-cpp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CPP/mytoolbar.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CS/mytoolbar.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/VB/mytoolbar.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Buttons As ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection

summary.span: 取得指派給工具列控制項的 控制項集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of controls assigned to the toolbar control.
A that contains a collection of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是以零為起始的索引的集合，用來保存所有指派給工具列控制項。The property is a zero-based indexed collection used to hold all the controls assigned to the toolbar. 因為屬性是唯讀的它可以指派工具列按鈕的集合直接。Because the property is read-only, it can not be assigned a collection of toolbar buttons directly. 工具列按鈕可以加入或移除使用的方法繼承自類別。Toolbar buttons can be added or removed by using the methods inherited from the class. 使用方法，將個別的按鈕和方法，以刪除按鈕。Use the method to add individual buttons and the method to delete a button. 呼叫方法從集合移除所有的按鈕。Call the method to remove all the buttons from the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化和三個控制項。The following code example creates and initializes a and three controls. 工具列按鈕會指派給工具列和工具列加入至表單。The toolbar buttons are assigned to the toolbar and the toolbar is added to the form. 此程式碼需要已經建立。This code requires that a has already been created. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBar.Buttons Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.Buttons Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBar.Buttons Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.Buttons Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBar.Buttons Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.Buttons Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Size ButtonSize { System::Drawing::Size get(); void set(System::Drawing::Size value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定工具列控制項上按鈕的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the buttons on the toolbar control.

value.span: 物件，表示工具列上 控制項的大小。

span.span: A object that represents the size of the controls on the toolbar.

value.span: 預設寬度是 24 個像素，高度是 22 個像素，或是足以容納 和文字的大小，以最適用者為優先。

span.span: The default size has a width of 24 pixels and a height of 22 pixels, or large enough to accommodate the and text, whichever is greater.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未設定，設定為其預設值。If the is not set, it is set to its default. 或者，計算以容納最大和文字指派給控制項。Alternatively, a is computed to accommodate the largest and text assigned to the controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立控制項中，設定某些共用的屬性，並將它加入。The following code example creates a control, sets some of its common properties, and adds it to a . 委派也會新增至和事件。Delegates are also added to the and events. 這個範例需要名為`toolBar1`和名為`imageList1`已經宣告。This example requires that a named `toolBar1` and an named `imageList1` have been declared. [!code-cpp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CPP/mytoolbar.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CS/mytoolbar.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/VB/mytoolbar.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Divider { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出工具列是否顯示分割線。

span.span: if the toolbar displays a divider; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分割線會顯示以協助識別工具列和相鄰的控制項，例如功能表。Dividers are displayed to help distinguish the toolbar from adjacent controls, such as menus. 分割線會顯示為凸起的邊緣上方控制項。A divider is displayed as a raised edge along the top of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立控制項中，設定某些共用的屬性，並將它加入。The following code example creates a control, sets some of its common properties, and adds it to a . 委派也會新增至和事件。Delegates are also added to the and events. 這個範例需要名為`toolBar1`和名為`imageList1`已經宣告。This example requires that a named `toolBar1` and an named `imageList1` have been declared. [!code-cpp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CPP/mytoolbar.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CS/mytoolbar.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/VB/mytoolbar.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設`false`，不向下箭號顯示在下拉式清單樣式工具列按鈕上。When is set to `false`, no down arrows display on drop-down style toolbar buttons. 當使用者按一下工具列上的下拉式按鈕時，在功能表下拉選取範圍。When the user clicks the drop-down button on the toolbar, the menu drops down for selection. 顯示的下拉式箭號時，使用者必須按向下箭號，以顯示功能表。When the drop-down arrow is displayed, the user must press the down arrow to display the menu. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立控制項中，設定某些共用的屬性，並將它加入。The following code example creates a control, sets some of its common properties, and adds it to a . 委派也會新增至和事件。Delegates are also added to the and events. 這個範例需要名為`toolBar1`和名為`imageList1`已經宣告。This example requires that a named `toolBar1` and an named `imageList1` have been declared. MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnButtonClick(class System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnButtonClick (e As ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs)

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要設定工具提示所顯示的文字，設定每個屬性上。To set the text displayed by the ToolTip, set the property of each on the . 若要讓使用者移動滑鼠指標停留在工具列按鈕所顯示的工具提示，請設定屬性`true`。To cause the ToolTip to display as the user moves the mouse pointer over the toolbar button, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立控制項中，設定某些共用的屬性，並將它加入。The following code example creates a control, sets some of its common properties, and adds it to a . 委派也會新增至和事件。Delegates are also added to the and events. 這個範例需要名為`toolBar1`和名為`imageList1`已經宣告。This example requires that a named `toolBar1` and an named `imageList1` have been declared. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Wrappable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出工具列按鈕是否會在工具列小得無法將所有按鈕顯示在同一行時換行。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the toolbar buttons wrap to the next line if the toolbar becomes too small to display all the buttons on the same line.

value.span: 如果工具列按鈕會在工具列小得無法將所有按鈕顯示在同一行時換行，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the toolbar buttons wrap to another line if the toolbar becomes too small to display all the buttons on the same line; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工具列按鈕可以使用分隔符號來分割為邏輯群組。Toolbar buttons can be divided into logical groups by using separators. 分隔符號是工具列按鈕與屬性設定為`ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator`。A separator is a toolbar button with the property set to `ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator`. 如果屬性設定為`true`和工具列小得無法在同一行顯示所有的按鈕、 工具列細分為各種其他的程式行，與發生在分隔符號則會中斷。If the property is set to `true` and the toolbar becomes too small to display all the buttons on the same line, the toolbar is broken into additional lines, with the breaks occurring at the separators. 這可確保按鈕群組保持在一起。This ensures that button groups stay together. 工具列會換行時，可以區隔不在群組中的工具列按鈕。Toolbar buttons that are not in a group can be separated when the toolbar wraps. 工具列可能會變得太小，無法在同一行顯示其所有的按鈕，如果其父代重新調整大小。The toolbar can become too small to display all its buttons on the same line if its parent is resized. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立控制項中，設定某些共用的屬性，並將它加入。The following code example creates a control, sets some of its common properties, and adds it to a . 委派也會新增至和事件。Delegates are also added to the and events. 這個範例需要名為`toolBar1`和名為`imageList1`已經宣告。This example requires that a named `toolBar1` and an named `imageList1` have been declared. [!code-cpp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CPP/mytoolbar.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CS/mytoolbar.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/VB/mytoolbar.vb#1)]
